sentences.english: Suddenly, there was a voice, "Come, Love, I will take you.
sentences.chinese: 突然，传来一个声音“来吧，爱情，我将携你同行。”

sentences.english: The treasurer decamped with part of the company's payroll.
sentences.chinese: 司库携公司工资总额之部分潜逃了。

sentences.english: By 1949, Lessing had moved to London with her young son.
sentences.chinese: 1949年的时候，莱辛已经携幼子移居伦敦。

sentences.english: In Southern Song Dynasty, Sima Xi took his wife Wenxiu to visit her parents, whose home in Xiling.
sentences.chinese: 南宋时期，司马樨携妻文秀拜访岳父母，居西泠。

sentences.english: Frustrated ever hate carrying solution, greeting Moling go back west.
sentences.chinese: 失意何曾恨解携，问安归去秣陵西。

sentences.english: In Southern Song Dynasty, Sima Xi took his wife Wenxiu to visit her parents.
sentences.chinese: 南宋时期，司马樨携妻文秀拜访岳父母。

sentences.english: The treasurer ran off with all the club's funds.
sentences.chinese: 司库携俱乐部的全部款子潜逃。

sentences.english: Zhang Degang-the factory director with all employee await respectively each friend's presence.
sentences.chinese: 厂长张德刚携全厂职工恭候各位朋友光临指导。

sentences.english: This little flute of a reed thou hast carried over hills and dales, and hast breathed through it melodies eternally new.
sentences.chinese: 你携着这小芦笛逾山越谷，从笛管里吹出永新的音乐。

sentences.english: Queensland Ballet has toured this production to more than 30 houses, including overseas tours to Japan.
sentences.chinese: 至今，舞团已携此剧在30多所剧场进行演出。

sentences.english: Dongjing Li portability majority of staff wish you good health, business is booming.
sentences.chinese: 董经理携广大员工祝大家身体健康，生意兴隆。

sentences.english: It carries the scent of honeysuckle, sweet as the lover's kiss.
sentences.chinese: 吐息轻携着忍冬的芬芳，香若爱侣的蜜吻。

sentences.english: The best does not come alone.
sentences.chinese: 佳物不独来，万物同相携。

sentences.english: Long life, carry your name with the tour.
sentences.chinese: 漫漫人生，携你的名字同游。

sentences.english: Bailiffs of hand, and carrying old son.
The wind through the window, with a cool, brushed the hair.
sentences.chinese: 风透过窗，携一丝微凉，拂乱了一缕长发。
